name: Bison Chocolate Stout
description:
"This richly textured, roasty dry stout has a boost of bitter and charismatic flavor from the addition of cocoa powder in the mash. We blend five unique organic malts to create Bison's most award winning beer." from http://bisonbrew.com/chocolate-stout.asp

And I concur.  This is a relatively mild stout, with a malty rich flavor.  Adding this to my list of preferred beers.
